verses.name: 2 Kings 4:28
verses.text: Then she said, Did I desire a son of my lord? did I not say, Do not deceive me?

verses.name: 2 Kings 4:29
verses.text: Then he said to Gehazi, Gird up thy loins, and take my staff in thine hand, and go thy way: if thou meet any man, salute him not; and if any salute thee, answer him not again: and lay my staff upon the face of the child.

verses.name: 2 Kings 4:30
verses.text: And the mother of the child said, As the Lord liveth, and as thy soul liveth, I will not leave thee. And he arose, and followed her.
